professional_summary: 3 years of professional experience in database administration, data analysis, and IT support. Expertise in MS SQL Server/ETL development, ERP systems, data warehousing concepts, Power BI tools, and database management processes across various industries.

key_responsibilities: Collaborating with development teams to implement and optimize database solutions.
Troubleshooting complex database issues and enhancing performance.
Utilizing monitoring tools to ensure system efficiency and security.
Administering production servers and maintaining database integrity.
Developing and maintaining a reference data dictionary for organizational consistency.
Supporting business requirements analysis and data collection processes.
Analyzing financial market data to improve decision-making capabilities.
Resolving client technical issues and providing tier-2 support.
Collaborating with vendor teams to resolve software and hardware problems.
Monitoring desktop infrastructure and ensuring system stability.
Evaluating and deploying new software patches for improved functionality.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Quality
education.institution: University of Arkansas at Little Rock

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
